notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All authors conceived the study. J.E.R. and J.M. Strugnell conceived and designed the experiments. J.E.R. performed the experiments. J.E.R., C.A.S. and J.M. Strugnell analysed the data. G.T.P. and J.M. Strugnell contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools. All authors wrote the paper.
